We're Hiring!

Hey everyone! We're on the lookout for a talented AWS Data Engineer to join our team. If you have strong experience building production data pipelines and data lakes on AWS, we want to hear from you!

In this role, you'll design, implement, and maintain ELT pipelines using AWS S3, Glue, and Athena to support analytics and GenAI use cases. We're looking for someone who can build reliable, scalable data solutions that power insights and ML applications.

Check out the full job description & apply here: https://lnkd.in/gWdYqVZa

Please note, this is not an entry-level position. Thanks for your help, and feel free to share this post!‚Ä¶ more

We are thrilled to invite applications for a 3-month internship starting in January!

This opportunity is open to everyone, including final-year college students, regardless of backlogs, CGPA, or degree discipline. We welcome applicants from all engineering backgrounds.

Our internships are designed to be intense and will equip you with the skills to deliver world-class consulting services to our clients.

We are also excited to share that we have made full-time offers to Shailesh, Swathi, and Rahul from our previous internship opportunities. We are proud to be their team of choice!

If you love solving problems with code, we would love to hear from you! Please send your internship applications to
92105bee.quabyt.com@in.teams.ms
8861fa10.quabyt.com@in.teams.ms

For experienced professionals, feel free to apply for open positions through our website.

Looking forward to your applications!

Wishing all friends of Quabyt a very happy new year and wishing it is filled with good health, growth, learning and wisdom! 
We had a fun filled blessed year and thank all our clients, team members, partners, friends, family and well wishers for being there to cheer us as we invent the future with our clients!

120th Anniversary of the First Powered, Controlled Flight
Orville Wright makes the first powered, controlled flight on Earth as his brother Wilbur looks on in this image taken at Kitty Hawk, North Carolina, on Dec. 17, 1903. Orville Wright covered 120 feet in 12 seconds during the first flight. The Wright brothers made four flights that day, each longer than the last.
Image Credit: Library of Congress

Learn to Automate with AI

1yr ‚Ä¢ 

PostgresML - AI library of the day: PostgresML is an open-source library available in Python, Javascript, and SQL, extending üêò PostgreSQL into a machine learning platform, allowing you to train models and make predictions using SQL right inside your database.

PostgresML extends üêò PostgreSQL into a complete platform for classical machine learning and AI. It enables AI engineers to train and deploy models directly in their database using standard SQL queries. Its main benefit is eliminating the complex microservice infrastructure typically needed for model management.

üí° PostgresML Key Highlights

1Ô∏è‚É£ GPU-powered inference for low latency predictions and streaming response support from large language models like GPT-3

2Ô∏è‚É£ Manage open source ML models from HuggingFace ü§ó and track experiment results

3Ô∏è‚É£ Train tabular data on 50+ algorithms like random forests üå≥ and neural networks üß†

4Ô∏è‚É£ Generate and index vector embeddings for text search, recommendations, etc

5Ô∏è‚É£ Horizontal scalability to millions of predictions per second utilizing PostgreSQL's reliability and tooling

By consolidating your model data pipeline into PostgreSQL, PostgresML streamlines MLOps. You can go from training to production deployment with simple SQL, keeping your models close to your data and application for faster insights. üöÄ

Overall, PostgresML simplifies machine learning infrastructure by leveraging PostgreSQL's mature data management capabilities. It's like bringing your models directly into your database.

üìä Tell me more about PostgresML!
